Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinesUI

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board Class containing the 3D minesweeper board

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Default constructor Sets width, length, and height to 4, creating a 64 tiled board Sets numMines to 18
      Board(int width, int length, int height, int numMines)
      Parameter constructor creating a board with dimension inputs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean adjacentMines(int length, int width, int height)
      Method to test if there are any mineCells adjacent to a specific Cell
      void changeValues()
      Changes the integer state value of a particular Cell object in the board array based on the number of mines around it
      void createBoard()
      Creates the board by filling up the 3D array with "-"
      void explode() 
      int generatePointValue(int x, int y, int z)
      Calculates the number of mines around a particular cell
      Cell[][][] getBoard()
      Getter method for board
      Cell getCell(int length, int width, int height)
      Getter method to return a single cell
      int howManyMines(int x, int y, int z)
      Method to return mine at specific location
      boolean onClick(int l, int w, int h)
      OnClick Method that is called whenever the user clicks on a cell
      void printBoard()
      Test method used to print out the board.
      void scramble()
      Randomly places a numMines number of mines on the board board[0][0][0] is kept as a safeCell to ensure the user doesn't click on a mine on the first click
      void spread(int length, int width, int height)
      Method to reveal adjacent safeCells if no mineCells are nearby.
      void spread2(int l, int w, int h) 
      void spreadToAdjacent(int length, int width, int height)
      Helper method to call on spread() multiple time if no mines are nearby

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Default constructor Sets width, length, and height to 4, creating a 64 tiled board Sets numMines to 18

      • Board

        public Board(int width,
             int length,
             int height,
             int numMines)
        Parameter constructor creating a board with dimension inputs
        Parameters:
        width - Width of Board
        length - Length of Board
        height - Height of Board
        numMines - Number of Mines

    • Method Detail

      • adjacentMines

        public boolean adjacentMines(int length,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Method to test if there are any mineCells adjacent to a specific Cell
        Parameters:
        length - length of board
        width - width of board
        height - height of board
        Returns:
        true if there are mines, false if there aren't any mines

      • changeValues

        public void changeValues()
        Changes the integer state value of a particular Cell object in the board array based on the number of mines around it

      • createBoard

        public void createBoard()
        Creates the board by filling up the 3D array with "-"

      • explode

        public void explode()

      • generatePointValue

        public int generatePointValue(int x,
                              int y,
                              int z)
        Calculates the number of mines around a particular cell
        Parameters:
        x - length coordinate of cell
        y - width coordinate of cell
        z - height coordinate of cell
        Returns:
        int # of mines around cell

      • getBoard

        public Cell[][][] getBoard()
        Getter method for board
        Returns:
        3D Array of Cell Objects

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int length,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Getter method to return a single cell
        Parameters:
        l - -length of cell
        w - -width of cell
        h - -height of cell
        Returns:
        a specific cell

      • howManyMines

        public int howManyMines(int x,
                        int y,
                        int z)
        Method to return mine at specific location
        Parameters:
        x - length
        y - width
        z - height
        Returns:
        1 for mine, 0 for no mine

      • onClick

        public boolean onClick(int l,
                       int w,
                       int h)
        OnClick Method that is called whenever the user clicks on a cell
        Parameters:
        l - -length of cell
        w - -width of cell
        h - -height of cell
        Returns:
        true if a mine is clicked false otherwise

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        Test method used to print out the board. Only for debugging purposes, not used in the actual program

      • scramble

        public void scramble()
        Randomly places a numMines number of mines on the board board[0][0][0] is kept as a safeCell to ensure the user doesn't click on a mine on the first click

      • spread

        public void spread(int length,
                   int width,
                   int height)
        Method to reveal adjacent safeCells if no mineCells are nearby. In addition, sets the "Clickable" boolean for the specific cell to false (already clicked on)
        Parameters:
        length - length of board
        width - width of board
        height - height of board

      • spread2

        public void spread2(int l,
                    int w,
                    int h)

      • spreadToAdjacent

        public void spreadToAdjacent(int length,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Helper method to call on spread() multiple time if no mines are nearby
        Parameters:
        length - length of board
        width - width of board
        height - height of board
